reviewText:
I did not get to see the movie because it keeps stopping and reloading video, this is the second time I paid for a movie and could not see it. There is nothing wrong with my equipment because I get Netflix via same Comcast cable without any issues ever.
Amazon needs to debug there broadcast send before I order another movie.

This .wmv downloaded is limited. I cannot watch it witch my player of choice cannot convert the format. I should have been informed before I made the purchase or I would not have done so. LIMITED USE.
I think the material is very good but the presentation is a bit ponderous. College level students were waiting patiently for the end of the video this morning.

This is a good video that can fit into one class period for our high school religion class. It is helpful as background to studying Jesus in the New Testament to set the context of the world Jesus knew. The acting is not great, but it has good visuals and the content is just perfect for high schoolers.
Amazing to see the size and perspective of Herod's Temple.  I've read the Bible, history books  and seen photos of the Wailing Wall, etc.  I was in awe seeing the massive size of the structure.
